title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Cozy Fall Apple Teas for Calm, Comfort, and Good Sleep

What you get:
- Two gentle, caffeine-free teas from The Republic of Tea.
- Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea.
- 36 tea bags of each flavor (plenty to share or enjoy all season).

Why you’ll like them:
- No caffeine: Sip any time of day or evening without jitters.
- Warm, familiar flavors:
  - Hot Apple Cider: Tastes like apple pie spices—apple, cinnamon, cloves, and a hint of orange.
  - Caramel Apple: Smooth and sweet with real apple, vanilla, and rooibos from South Africa.
- Kind to the stomach and soothing for the throat.
- Smells wonderful—like a cozy fall kitchen.

Simple directions:
1) Boil water.
2) Pour 6 ounces (about 3/4 cup) into your mug.
3) Add one tea bag.
4) Steep 5 to 7 minutes. Longer makes a stronger cup.
5) Remove tea bag and enjoy. Add honey or milk if you like.

Helpful tips:
- Great after dinner as a dessert tea.
- Tea bags can go in your garden compost or potted plants.
- Store in a cool, dry place to keep the aromas fresh.

Easy to choose:
- Prefer classic spice? Pick Hot Apple Cider.
- Prefer smooth and sweet? Pick Caramel Apple.
- Not sure? Try both—this bundle includes each flavor.

A comforting, fall treat that’s simple to make, gentle on the nerves, and perfect for quiet moments at home.
